product_name: Merrell Chameleon 5 Waterproof Hiking Shoes - Men's
long_description: Merrell Chameleon 5 hiking shoes deliver waterproof, breathable protection and reponsive athletic control on the trail. You'll appreciate the comfort and support on day hikes and fastpacking jaunts. Flexible pig suede leather and breathable polyester mesh uppers keep weight low and comfort high; thermoplastic urethane arms enhance stability at heels and insteps. Waterproof breathable membrane keeps water out, while allowing feet to breathe so you don't overheat. Polyester mesh linings wick away excess moisture and dry quickly for comfort; bellowed tongues keep debris out. 2mm EVA footbeds and compression-molded EVA midsoles cushion each step. Nylon arch shanks help control flex and enhance support and protection on rough terrain. Vibram(R) Chameleon rubber outsoles with 5mm lugs provide excellent traction and durability on wet and dry surfaces.
short_description: Merrell Chameleon 5 hiking shoes deliver waterproof, breathable protection and reponsive athletic control on the trail. You'll appreciate the comfort and support on day hikes and fastpacking jaunts.
